articles.author: Richard Laverty
articles.title: Why is Nottingham Forest vs Sheffield United not on TV?
articles.description: Nottingham Forest vs Sheffield United is not on TV – and it's all because of… cricket!?
articles.content:
Nottingham Forest vs Sheffield United is not on TV tonight – due to the cricket.
The first Friday night football of the Premier League season beckons when Forest host the newly-promoted Blades ahead… [+2591 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]

articles.title: Malinga replaces Bond as Mumbai Indians' fast-bowling coach for IPL 2024
articles.description: will return to Mumbai Indians for IPL 2024, this time as their fast-bowling coach. He will replace Shane Bond, who had held that position for the past nine seasons. | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Lasith Malinga is back for Mumbai Indians, this time as fast-bowling coach and Lasith Malinga will return to Mumbai Indians for IPL 2024 [+7984 chars]
